original_text: Then he brought me to the inner court on the east side, and he measured the gateway; it had the same measurements as the others.
korean_text: 그가 나를 데리고 안뜰 동쪽으로 가서 그 문간을 측량하니 크기는

sentences.original_text: Then he brought me to the inner court on the east side
it had the same measurements as the others
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 다른 것들과 동일한 치수를 가졌습니다
